pr_title: Assign getStackTrace result to a local variable to avoid refetching

timeline.bodyHTML:
Suggested change
// Assign the result to a local variable to avoid race condition
// that stackTrace might be set back to null.
// Assign the result to a local variable to avoid refetching
// the instance variable and any memory ordering issues
timeline.author: DanHeidinga

replies.bodyText: I think we should reword the comment as I still don't see a race condition.  I'm not convinced my phrasing is better but without knowing what the race is, I'd rather avoid suggesting there is one
replies.author: DanHeidinga

replies.bodyText:
@DanHeidinga Thanks, agreed that this might be a memory ordering issue instead. Updated the comments accordingly.
Please start the PR tests.
replies.author: JasonFengJ9

timeline.message:
Assign getStackTrace result to a local variable to avoid refectching

Assigned J9VMInternals.getStackTrace(this, true) result to a local
variable to avoid refetching the instance variable and any memory
ordering issues.

Signed-off-by: Jason Feng <fengj@ca.ibm.com>
